testcase.classname: To the Check the functionalities of the Retailer Sign up/Sign in
testcase.name: To Validate the Retailer Sign up
testcase.system-out: Given To launch the Chrome Browser and Maximise window......................passed When launch the URL of the ShopDot Application..............................passed And Complete the Signup Flows...............................................passed And Retailer clicks Sign Up button..........................................passed And ShopDot displays the screen Retailer or Brand Supplier..................passed And user clicks on “Retailer” and clicks on Next............................passed Then the Url Should Contain "retailer-onboarding" Retailer Onboarding Screen will be displayed.passed

testcase.classname: To the Check the functionalities of the Retailer Sign up/Sign in
testcase.name: To Check Mandatory fields validation
testcase.system-out: Given To launch the Chrome Browser and Maximise window......................passed When launch the URL of the ShopDot Application..............................passed And The User Left mandatory fields blank in Sign Up Screen.................passed Then Sign Up button in Sign Up Screen will be disabled......................passed

testcase.classname: To the Check the functionalities of the Retailer Sign up/Sign in
testcase.name: Password has invalid format
testcase.system-out: Given To launch the Chrome Browser and Maximise window......................passed When To launch the URL of the ShopDot Application and Complete the Signup Flow.passed And enters a password that has an invalid format............................passed Then error message is displayed.............................................passed

testcase.classname: To the Check the functionalities of the Retailer Sign up/Sign in
testcase.name: Email address is already registered and verified
testcase.system-out: Given To launch the Chrome Browser and Maximise window......................passed When To launch the URL of the ShopDot Application and Complete the Signup Flow.passed And enters an email address that is already registered and verified.........passed Then the error message is displayed.........................................passed

testcase.classname: To the Check the functionalities of the Retailer Sign up/Sign in
testcase.name: Terms link
testcase.system-out: Given To launch the Chrome Browser and Maximise window......................passed When To launch the URL of the ShopDot Application...........................passed And user clicks on the “Terms” link from the checkbox in Sign Up Screen.....passed Then Terms of Use Screen will be displayed on a separate tab................passed

testcase.classname: To the Check the functionalities of the Retailer Sign up/Sign in
testcase.name: Privacy Policy link
testcase.system-out: Given To launch the Chrome Browser and Maximise window......................passed When To launch the URL of the ShopDot Application...........................passed And user clicks on the “Privacy Policy” link from the checkbox in Sign Up Screen.passed Then Privacy Policy Screen will be displayed on a separate tab..............passed

testcase.classname: To the Check the functionalities of the Retailer Sign up/Sign in
testcase.name: Sign in
testcase.system-out: Given To launch the Chrome Browser and Maximise window......................passed When To launch the URL of the ShopDot Application...........................passed And Retailer Enters email address...........................................passed And Retailer Enters Password................................................passed Then Retailer goes directly to the Dashboard................................passed

testcase.classname: To the Check the functionalities of the Retailer Sign up/Sign in
testcase.name: Email address has invalid format
testcase.system-out: Given To launch the Chrome Browser and Maximise window......................passed When To launch the URL of the ShopDot Application...........................passed And user enters an email "gmail.com" address in invalid format..............passed Then the following error message is displayed below the Email Address field: “Email address must be in correct format”.passed

testcase.classname: To the Check the functionalities of the Retailer Sign up/Sign in
testcase.name: Login when user is not yet verified
testcase.system-out: Given Launch the URL of Shopdot.............................................passed When user enters email address..............................................passed And user enters email password..............................................passed And clicks on Sign In button from Login Screen..............................passed Then ShopDot resends the verification email to the entered email address....passed

testcase.classname: To the Check the functionalities of the Retailer Sign up/Sign in
testcase.name: Forgot Password
testcase.system-out: Given Launch Shopdot URL...................................................passed When User clicks on Forgot Password from Login Screen.......................passed And Email Address Input Screen will be displayed............................passed And Enter Email Address in Email Input......................................passed And Click on the Send Email button..........................................passed Then displays the following message on screen: “We have sent instructions on how to change your password to your registered email”.passed

testcase.classname: To the Check the functionalities of the Retailer Sign up/Sign in
testcase.name: Email is NOT a registered user in ShopDot
testcase.system-out: Given Launch Shopdot URL...................................................passed When User clicks on Forgot Password from Login Screen.......................passed And User enters his email address and clicks on Send email button from Email Address Input Screen.passed And ShopDot verifies that entered email address is NOT a registered email...passed Then displays the following message on screen...............................passed

testcase.classname: To the Check the functionalities of the Retailer Sign up/Sign in
testcase.name: Change Password from Link
testcase.system-out: When User clicks on “Reset Password” link from the email sent...............passed And Reset Password Screen is displayed......................................passed And User enters mandatory fields and clicks on Confirm button from Reset Password Screen.passed Then ShopDot saves the new password and displays the message on screen: “Your password is successfully changed”.passed

testcase.classname: To the Check the functionalities of the Retailer Sign up/Sign in
testcase.name: Passwords do not match
testcase.system-out: When User enters mandatory fields and clicks on Confirm button from Reset Password Screen.passed And ShopDot verifies that the new password and confirm new password are not the same.passed Then ShopDot displays the error message below the Confirm New Password field: “Passwords do not match”.passed

testcase.classname: To the Check the functionalities of the Retailer Sign up/Sign in
testcase.name: New Password requirements are not met
testcase.system-out: When User enters the new password...........................................undefined And ShopDot verifies that it does not meet the password requirements........skipped Then an error message will be displayed below the New Password field........skipped
